name: Blueberry Pediatrics
headline: 24/7 pediatric clinic in every family's living room
description: Blueberry Medical provides concierge pediatric care with at-home medical diagnostics and an always-available team of Pediatricians. Blueberry handles twice as may illnesses as any other telemedicine provider and has proven to reduce ER costs by 50%.
tags: industry:consumer-health-services; industry:health-tech; industry:telehealth; industry:pediatrics; industry:digital-health; location:san-francisco-bay-area
generated_description:
**Company Overview: Blueberry Pediatrics**

Founded in 2017 as part of Y Combinator Batch W18, Blueberry Pediatrics is a trailblazer in the realm of pediatric care, positioning itself as a 24/7 pediatric clinic that fits right into the living room of every family. Located in Mountain View, California, the company emerged from its predecessor, Blueberry Medical, to provide concierge pediatric services and at-home medical diagnostics through a team of always-available pediatricians.

**Mission and Vision**

Blueberry Pediatrics aims to revolutionize pediatric healthcare accessibility by reducing long emergency room wait times and slashing urgent care costs by 50%. Their mission is clear: offer exceptional medical care anytime and anywhere, effectively bringing pediatric expertise into the comfort of home.

**Service Offerings and Impact**

In the telehealth domain, Blueberry excels, managing double the illnesses compared to traditional telemedicine providers. This is accomplished through their innovative app, which connects families with board-certified pediatricians who can diagnose and prescribe medications swiftly—often in as little as a few minutes. 

Critically, they offer a comprehensive at-home medical kit that empowers parents to actively participate in their child’s healthcare, enabling pediatricians to make more informed diagnoses. The cost? An annual membership is just $216. This covers unlimited visits without additional fees, making it a cost-efficient choice compared to standard healthcare options which can quickly escalate, especially for families with high-deductible insurance plans.

**Expert Team**

Blueberry is backed by a dedicated team of 15 employees, including board-certified pediatricians who are not just professionals but also parents themselves. Each pediatrician brings diverse expertise and a personal touch to their care, creating a comforting and relatable healthcare experience.

**Recognition and Growth**

Since its inception, Blueberry has received several accolades, including recognition as one of the best in on-demand medical care and pediatric telehealth. They have established a solid reputation not just locally, but across the rapidly growing telehealth marketplace.

**Join the Movement**

For parents looking for a reliable and innovative solution to pediatric care, Blueberry Pediatrics presents a risk-free opportunity. With a 100% satisfaction guarantee, families can easily try the service, reassured by the online community of families who have found relief through Blueberry’s approachable healthcare model.

For more information, visits, or to get started, check out [Blueberry Pediatrics](https://blueberrypediatrics.com/).
